Package com.novell.ldapchai

The LDAP Chai API, easy to use LDAP for Java developers.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
ChaiConstant Constants used by the Chai API.
ChaiEntry ChaiEntry instances represent ldap entries.
ChaiFactory.ChaiEntryFactory  
ChaiGroup Represents an ldap group entry.
ChaiPasswordPolicy Represents a password policy ldap entry.
ChaiUser Represents an ldap user entry.
 

Class Summary
ChaiFactory Factory for ChaiEntry and its subclasses.
 

Enum Summary
ChaiPasswordRule A list of rules available for the password policy.
ChaiPasswordRule.RuleType  
 

Package com.novell.ldapchai Description

The LDAP Chai API, easy to use LDAP for Java developers.
